titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to waive the deadline on the construction of GO Zone property which is eligible for bonus depreciation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
3/13/2008--Introduced.
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to eliminate the deadline for beginning construction projects in the Gulf Opportunity (GO) Zone for purposes of bonus depreciation eligibility.
